story: You find yourself standing at the edge of a large, dimly lit room within the gang stronghold. The walls are lined with old computer servers, their screens flickering with static. In the center of the room, a massive mainframe server hums loudly, casting an eerie glow over the space. Suddenly, you notice that several of the server screens begin to flash with urgent messages. What do you do?

actions.action: Attempt to access and read the messages on the server screens
actions.good: You successfully access the messages, which reveal a hidden stash of valuable tech components. Your quick thinking earns you some useful loot.
actions.bad: Your attempt to access the messages triggers a security lockout, and the mainframe server begins to overheat. You take damage from the intense heat, but the loot remains out of reach.

actions.action: Try to disable the mainframe server to prevent any potential alarms
actions.good: You manage to disable the mainframe server, silencing its alarms and allowing you to search for hidden compartments or stashes. Your resourcefulness pays off with some valuable loot.
actions.bad: Your attempt to disable the mainframe server causes it to malfunction, spewing sparks and electrical discharges in all directions. You take damage from the chaos, but the loot remains out of reach.

actions.action: Leave the room and explore other areas of the gang stronghold
actions.good: You decide to leave the room and explore other areas of the gang stronghold, where you stumble upon a hidden stash of valuable items. Your curiosity rewards you with some useful loot.
actions.bad: While leaving the room, you trigger an alarm that alerts the rest of the gang. You take damage from the ensuing chaos, but the loot remains out of reach.
